metadata.title: RHSA-2018:3466: CloudForms 4.6.5 security, bug fix and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine delivers the insight, control, and automation needed to address the challenges of managing virtual environments. CloudForms Management Engine is built on Ruby on Rails, a model-view-controller (MVC) framework for web application development. Action Pack implements the controller and the view components.

Security Fix(es):

* rubyzip: arbitrary file write vulnerability / arbitrary code execution using a specially crafted zip file (CVE-2018-1000544)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

This update fixes various bugs and adds enhancements. Documentation for these changes is available from the Release Notes document.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2018-1000544 rubyzip: arbitrary file write vulnerability / arbitrary code execution using a specially crafted zip file
